short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export Claude conversations in various formats

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly save your Claude AI conversations as TXT, MD, CSV, JSON, or HTML files with this simple exporting extension.
Claude Conversation Exporter allows you to quickly extract and export your conversations from any Claude AI chat as various file formats.
How to use this tool:

Go to a Claude conversation page
Use the SELECT button to choose what to export
You can also click the checkboxes next to individual messages to select specific content for export
Click EXPORT to choose the export format
The exported file will be downloaded automatically.
